input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5 ft Flocked White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Alaskan Pine Flocked Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Blue Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Winston Porter 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Christmas Central Fairfield Fir Full Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='9 ft. Christmas Tree - Arcadia Pine Quick-Light Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='9 ft. Christmas Tree - Starry White Spruce Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='9 ft. Christmas Tree - Montana Flocked Full Profile Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Colorado Spruce 6' 2-Tone Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 5ft Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='George Oliver Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Haute Decor 2.5Ft Unlit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5 ft Flocked Sierra Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 5' Medium Mixed Green Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 7 ft. Unlit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7' Artificial Christmas Tree with Multicolor Lights'
  - Name='COMHOMA 6.5ft Classic Un-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree 7.5 ft.'
  - Name='Costway Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged Douglas Fir Full Xmas Tree with 1355 Branch Tips & Foldable Metal Stand for Holiday Decor'
  - Name='Vickerman 3' x 25" Black Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The product is an artificial Christmas tree, but the 'slim' silhouette is different from the 'full body' shape of the reference Dunhill Fir. Both include artificial fir construction, but intended display presence differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5 ft Flocked White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial tree function and size, but features a flocked finish and different tree species ('Spruce' instead of 'Fir'), and likely a somewhat different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Alaskan Pine Flocked Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree, but flocked and based on 'Pine' rather than 'Fir.' Silhouette and branch style likely somewhat different; flocking detail diverges from the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Blue Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very closely matches on tree style ('Dunhill Fir') and has clear lights, but uses 'Blue Fir' instead of 'Standard Fir.' Construction and features are highly similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Winston Porter 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial 'Fir' tree, similar height, but 'slim' silhouette is less full than the reference. Unlit construction aligns with the 'unlit' variant of Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Central Fairfield Fir Full Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full body fir tree structure aligns well, but flocking changes appearance. High similarity in construction, silhouette, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Pine' tree instead of 'Fir,' likely a different silhouette and branch structure, though overall product purpose is similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Christmas Tree - Arcadia Pine Quick-Light Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but at a much larger size (9 ft vs 6 ft), 'Pine' construction, and pre-lit, differing from the unlit characteristic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Christmas Tree - Starry White Spruce Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial, pre-lit, large tree with a 'Spruce' style instead of 'Fir' and a much taller, potentially different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Christmas Tree - Montana Flocked Full Profile Tree - Frontgate - Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Full profile' matches well with the Dunhill's fullness, but flocking and overall size (9ft) differentiate it from the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Colorado Spruce 6' 2-Tone Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6' unlit artificial tree closely matches size and unlit feature. 'Spruce' and branch styling slightly differ from 'Fir' full body shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 5ft Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree, but at a smaller size (5 ft instead of 6 ft). No indication of branch fullness, species, or construction details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: George Oliver Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial 'Fir,' unlit, but described as 'slim' rather than full, suggesting a somewhat different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 2.5Ft Unlit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir construction, but very small size (2.5 ft), making it suitable for desktop or accent use rather than central room display.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same core features: full, 6 ft, unlit, fir, artificial tree with sturdy construction. The only major difference is the snow-dusted finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 7.5 ft Flocked Sierra Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Full,' 'Fir,' and 'Artificial' all match. Slightly larger and flocked, which differ from the reference full green look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 5' Medium Mixed Green Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree with a mixed green 'Pine' design, different size (5'), and not as full as the reference Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 7 ft. Unlit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial, 7 ft, unlit tree; similar use, but 'Pine' (not 'Fir'), and likely different branch density and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7' Artificial Christmas Tree with Multicolor Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Dunhill Fir' by the same brand, only notable difference is inclusion of multicolor lights instead of unlit/pre-lit clear lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: COMHOMA 6.5ft Classic Un-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core artificial Christmas tree, similar size and unlit feature. Possibly less full but otherwise very closely matches on structural features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree 7.5 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical construction and brand; difference is 'White Fir' (vs 'Dunhill Fir') and slightly taller, but highly related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged Douglas Fir Full Xmas Tree with 1355 Branch Tips & Foldable Metal Stand for Holiday Decor
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very closely matches on construction, full body, hinged branches, unlit, with sturdy stand. 'Douglas Fir' differs from 'Dunhill Fir,' but otherwise highly aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 3' x 25" Black Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very small (3'), specialty color ('black'), and possibly intended for accent/novelty use, rather than central display.
